item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 1, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Building LLMs from the Ground Up: A 3-Hour Coding Workshop (343 points | 11 comments)
2. Taming the beast that is the Django ORM – An introduction (19 points | 2 comments)
3. Harder Drive: hard drives we didn't want, or need [video] (2022) (291 points | 49 comments)
4. Did your car witness a crime? (190 points | 409 comments)
5. WatchYourLAN: Lightweight Network IP Scanner (103 points | 8 comments)
6. Making an atomic trampoline [video] (49 points | 14 comments)
7. MapRoulette: the micro-tasking tool for OpenStreetMap (16 points | 4 comments)
8. A brief history of barbed wire fence telephone networks (42 points | 5 comments)
9. Percona Everest: open-source automated database provisioning and management (45 points | 10 comments)
10. Astronomers puzzled by little red galaxies that seem impossibly dense (37 points | 17 comments)
11. Playstation 2 GS emulation – the final frontier of Vulkan compute emulation (4 points | discuss)
12. Neutral beam microscopy using magnetic beam spin encoding (20 points | discuss)
13. LLMs struggle to explain themselves (39 points | 43 comments)
14. Brazil's X ban is sending lots of people to Bluesky (140 points | 232 comments)
15. Show HN: A retro terminal text editor for GNU/Linux coded in C (C-edit) (128 points | 34 comments)
16. Lucee: A light-weight dynamic CFML scripting language for the JVM (63 points | 23 comments)
17. Client-side QR code generator with SVG output (63 points | 10 comments)
18. Non-Determinism and Overcount on Modern Hardware Performance Counters [pdf] (10 points | 1 comment)
19. Epilepsy Protection for VRChat (4 points | discuss)
20. Continue (YC S23) Is Hiring a Software Engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)
21. Show HN: Typeform alternative, turns Markdown to forms (129 points | 40 comments)
22. Solving the labyrinth puzzle from the university quest using Python (5 points | discuss)
23. Ozempic could delay ageing, researchers suggest (29 points | 15 comments)
24. AirTags key to discovery of Houston's plastic recycling deception (96 points | 86 comments)
25. Buy, Borrow, Die – Explained (353 points | 270 comments)
26. Is my vision that bad? No, it's just a bug in Apple's Calculator (564 points | 355 comments)
27. My fake job in Y2K preparedness (108 points | 73 comments)
28. The Threat to OpenAI (111 points | 114 comments)
29. Iron as an inexpensive storage medium for hydrogen (145 points | 83 comments)
30. Designing a Timeline for Mobile Video Editing (60 points | 7 comments)
